attributes.action: Provide all families of fallen soldiers, with a full copy of the Chilcot Report.
attributes.background:
Families of the 179 soldiers killed during the Iraq conflict are being asked to pay £767 for a full copy of the Chilcot Report.
This petition is to ask the government to fund a full copy to each family, if they want one, as these families have already paid with the ultimate sacrifice.

rejection.details:
It has been reported that families will not have to pay for hard copies of the report of the Iraq Inquiry:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36442521
